testcase.name: A newly registered user can login
testcase.system-out: Given a user open the home page.............................................passed And the user makes registration.............................................passed And the registration is successful..........................................passed When the user enters "new" username and password............................passed Then the user logged in successfully........................................passed

testcase.name: An existing user can login with or without white spaces in the username and password - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given a user open the home page.............................................passed When the user enters "existing" username and password.......................passed Then the user logged in successfully........................................passed

testcase.name: An existing user can login with or without white spaces in the username and password - #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given a user open the home page.............................................passed When the user enters "white spaces with" username and password..............passed Then the user logged in successfully........................................passed

testcase.name: A user cannot login with a wrong username and password or empty credentials - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given a user open the home page.............................................passed When the user enters "invalid" username and password........................passed Then the user is shown "The username and password could not be verified."...passed

testcase.name: A user cannot login with a wrong username and password or empty credentials - #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given a user open the home page.............................................passed When the user enters "no" username and password.............................passed Then the user is shown "Please enter a username and password."..............passed

testcase.name: A user cannot login with a wrong username or wrong password - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given a user open the home page.............................................passed When the user enters "wrong username".......................................passed Then the user is shown "The username and password could not be verified."...passed

testcase.name: A user cannot login with a wrong username or wrong password - #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given a user open the home page.............................................passed When the user enters "wrong password".......................................passed Then the user is shown "The username and password could not be verified."...passed

testcase.name: A registered user can access forgotten login info in customer lookup page
testcase.system-out: Given a user open the home page.............................................passed And the user makes registration.............................................passed And the registration is successful..........................................passed And the user searches forgotten user credentials "with valid data"..........passed When the user enters "saved" username and password..........................passed Then the user logged in successfully........................................passed

testcase.name: A registered user cannot access forgotten login credentials without providing all required info - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given a user open the home page.............................................passed And the user makes registration.............................................passed And the registration is successful..........................................passed When the user searches forgotten user credentials "with missing data".......passed Then the user is shown "Social Security Number is required."...............passed

testcase.name: A registered user cannot access forgotten login credentials without providing any info
testcase.system-out: Given a user open the home page.............................................passed When the user searches forgotten user credentials without providing any personal info.passed Then the user is shown the proper error messages............................passed
